metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3659 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in graph_view.php in Cacti 0.8.8.g allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the host_group_data parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
